snippet: Former tour player Anne Keothavong has been chosen to succeed Judy Murray as captain of Britain's Fed Cup team....
lead_paragraph: Former tour player Anne Keothavong has been chosen to succeed Judy Murray as captain of Britain's Fed Cup team.

headline.print_headline: Keothavong Succeeds Judy Murray as Britain Fed Cup Captain
headline.main: Keothavong Succeeds Judy Murray as Britain Fed Cup Captain
